      • createNetworkHandler

        public abstract NetworkHandler createNetworkHandler(Client client,
                                                    String ip,
                                                    int port,
                                                    View view)
        Initializer for network handler, creates the right handler given the connection type.
        Parameters:
        client - orchestrating class
        ip - Server ip (from .properties file)
        port - Server port (from .properties file)
        view - Listener for messages coming from the network
        Returns:
        Newly created NetworkHandler
